question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term best describes the dynamics of children and their relationships with parents and siblings?
description: The image depicts an animated family consisting of five human characters and one dog. The family includes two adult figures who appear to be the parents, standing in the center. To their left is a young child, likely a toddler, and to their right are two older children, a girl and a boy. The family members are dressed casually, and the dog stands beside the boy. The characters exhibit distinct personalities through their expressions and postures. The setting suggests a close-knit group living together, indicative of a traditional family unit. There are no other relatives or extended family members present in the image. The focus is on the immediate family members, including the parents and their children.
